attributes.action: Pay the winter fuel payment to those on Disabillity Living Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel it is unfair that people on Disabillity Living Allowance don't get paid the winter fuel allowance when it is paid on other benefits such as 

* Pension Credit
  Income Support
  income-based Jobseeker's Allowance
  Employment and Support Allowance   (income related)

*The above information is from the     goverments own webpage
